items.name: Template_Window
items.content:
ui.UiFactory.customTypes["ui.Window"] = {
    "type": "ui.FreeLayout",
    "controls": [
        {
            "type": "ui.Frame",
            "inheritProperties": true,
            "image": "dropshadow",
            "style": "windowShadow",
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "zIndex": 0,
            "order": 0,
        },
        {
            "type": "ui.Image",
            "inheritProperties": true,
            "style": "windowTilePattern",
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "opacity": -> p.backgroundOpacity ? 255,
            "zIndex": 1,
            "order": 1,
        },
        {
            "type": "ui.Image",
            "inheritProperties": true,
            "style": "windowStretchPattern",
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "opacity": -> p.backgroundOpacity ? 255,
            "zIndex": 2,
            "order": 2
        },
        {
            "type": "ui.Frame",
            "inheritProperties": true,
            "style": "windowFrame",
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "zIndex": 3,
            "order": 3,
            "action": -> p.action
        }
    ]
}
